Volunteering](//www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A59C1CAB-E3E1-4FFA-964F-101BBF7C490C&Type=B_JOB) * [ADA](//www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=4EAD110C-47FC-4C60-A33D-58782C862699&Type=B_BASIC) | Meet Our Mayor and Council Davenport City Council meets on the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of every month at 7 p.m. in the Council Chambers which are located at City Hall.  City Hall is located at 411 Morgan St. in Davenport, WA  Mayor Chapman and the City Council members would like to extend an open hand to all citizens and welcome any questions, comments and concerns you may have.  Feel free to call City Hall at 509-725-4352 to request a place on the agenda, or drop by and sign in to place your comment.  [Jonathan Chapman](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=10E187B2-2880-4DA3-9A55-CDE959EE113C&Type=B_DIR) Mayor  [Daniel Coriell](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=650C0FDF-6762-4B89-90B4-347C4C3127CD&Type=B_DIR) Council Member Position # 1  [Michael Wilkinson](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=4EEB3B40-BA46-425F-B0B7-63B0FC35FE16&Type=B_DIR) Council Member Position # 2  [Lance Strite](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=7405F810-4D6A-46AE-BEE7-4A94FC2440B5&Type=B_DIR) Council Member Position #3  [Robert Jenkins](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=77B4ADA7-1131-44CF-B4F9-34435643538C&Type=B_DIR) Council Member Position #4  [Heath Becker](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=26ADDBCE-23EA-475A-A86A-1B64741FEB4B&Type=B_DIR) Council Member Position #5  [Cory Hollis](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=4AF1B45B-81CB-4EEE-8DC7-3C6BDB98EAAD&Type=B_DIR) Council Member Position #6  [Patrick Katz](https://www.davenportwa.us/index.asp?SEC=A2951C48-519E-4AAC-A2C8-4E8E24C4010C&DE=F8D91985-C8C3-4AA0-A336-F2CE43D6770B&Type=B_DIR) Council-at- Large |
